title: Taken exporteren & importeren in Thunderbird
content:
Ik had graag geweten hoe je ook je "Taken" vanuit Thunderbird kan exporteren, om dan deze "Taken" in een andere Thunderbird op een andere DeskTop hetzij Laptop opnieuw te importeren.

Account(s), e-mail, agenda('s) en adresboek(en) kan je allemaal vanuit Thunderbird exporteren en opniew importeren op een andere computer, zelfs naar bijvoorbeeld Outlook etc, alleen vind ik de werkwijze voor het exporteren & importeren van "Taken" nergens terug.

Dank voor een reply !

Mvg, Kurt Demeyere - Stasegem-Harelbeke, België
creator: kurtdemeyere1966

title: 구글메일 불러오기
content: 법인 기업입니다. 퇴사자의 구글 메일을 백업 후 열람을 위해 썬더버드를 사용하려고 합니다. 개인폴더 > 설정을 통해 '스팸함 및 휴지통을 포함한 모든 메일.mbox' 파일까지 생성되었고, 퇴사자 메일함에 있던 메일 제목까지 확인 가능합니다. 하지만 해당 메일을 눌러도 우측 화면에 내용 전체가 나오질 않습니다. 해결 방법을 알고 싶습니다.
creator: yrhong

title: Probleem met mail naar KPN servers

Enig idee hoe ik dit kan verhelpen? Alvast hartelijk dank voor jullie hulp. Groet Sybrand

title: Thunderbird Local Email Archive Folder
content:
How do I configure the new "Local Folders" archive set just created - so they'll be displayed and searchable in the Email folder view?

Thunderbird v128.9.0esr (64-bit) on Linux Ubuntu 24.04.2 LTS

I have archived emails on my IMAP server for some time.

Now to avoid a full quota on the server I have reconfigured the Archive to "Local Folders" and changed the configuration to yyyy/yyyy-mm.

After archiving "fresh" emails and re-archiving from the IMAP server archive folder

I can see the respective sequences of folders under the menu

  • Account Settings
  • email@account.com
  • Copies & Folders
  • Archives on Local Folder 
and within the file selector menu
  • Archives on Local Folders
  • Local Folders
  • Archives
  • 2023
  • 2023-01
  • 2023-02
  • etc

The result in the email account folder shows the old "Archive" folder - but now emptied - alongside new (unarchived) emails.

On interrogating the Archive folder properties the location reported is the (previous) IMAP address.

So how do I:

  1. identify the location of the newly created "Local Folders" archive set, and
  2. make the Archive folder set display and be searchable in the Email folder view?
creator: mail1619

title: How to Import Thunderbird to PST instantly?
content:
To convert Thunderbird emails to PST format, the easiest and most efficient method is by using a professionalhttps://yotasoftware.com/pst-converter/ PST converter tool. 

Here are the simple steps to convert Thunderbird to PST format:

Download & Install a reliable tool like Yota Thunderbird to PST Converter.

Launch the tool – it auto-detects your Thunderbird profile.

Select folders/emails from the Thunderbird account.

Choose PST as the export format.

Click Export to save the data in PST format.
